```{r, results = "asis", echo = FALSE}
library(data.table)
if (file.good(params$summary_table)){
    dt = fread(params$summary_table)
    dt[,3:ncol(dt)]=lapply(dt[,3:ncol(dt)],signif,digits=3)
    DT::datatable(dt, escape=FALSE,options = list(scrollX = TRUE))
}
```
